titleStmt.title: The history of the life & death of Oliver Cromwell the late usurper and pretended protector of England &c. / truely collected and published for a warning to all tyrants and usurpers by J.H.
titleStmt.author: Heath, James, 1629-1664.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: pages 4 and 5 misnumbered 2 and 4.
This item can be found at reels 1385:17 and 1689:17.
Wing number H72 cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
